title: 1.81版的那个怎么飞？
author: 甜丶豆包
txt_content: 按B右下角显示flying了，按空格只是不停地跳啊跳的想去浮空岛的说

replies.author: 路邊電燈泡
replies.txt_content: 你沒說是哪個模式，還有，你有裝MOD嗎?

replies.author: green丶bastard
replies.txt_content: 。。。创造模式是双击空格飞 至于你说的听不懂

replies.author: 甜丶豆包
replies.txt_content:
green丶bastard 发表于 2011-10-5 19:25 
。。。创造模式是双击空格飞 至于你说的听不懂
好吧，原来我玩的是生存模式...

replies.author: 甜丶豆包
replies.txt_content:
green丶bastard 发表于 2011-10-5 19:59 
那就采纳我吧 = =
肿么采纳？

replies.author: well
replies.txt_content:
按B飛行, 那是裝了CJB Mods

FLY
- Toggle Flying = Default Key B
- Fly Up Key = Default R
- Fly Down Key = Default F
- Speed Key = Default Left Shift
- Mouse Control = True / False
- Always Speed = True / False
- Speed = 1 to 10

飛行開關 -- B
向上飛 -- R
向下飛 -- F
速度 -- 左 Shift

replies.author: green丶bastard
replies.txt_content: - -。。那我叫管理员帮你采纳吧 我没提过问 全自己谷歌的
